description:
House slave Torn forgets that she may be corrected for the slightest infraction of the rules at any time. She is caught rolling her eyes at the Masters and swiftly corrected for her disrespectful behavior.
Master of the House, Mr. Acworth interrupts the daily chores to insist that these bitches get tied up more often, and Maestro is tasked with improving his rigging skills.
title: Service Session: Bondage Practice and Correcting Torn
